text: Cedric Moodie (born November 20, 1978) is an American professional basketball player who last played for the Brampton A's of the National Basketball League of Canada (NBL). He was an NBL Canada All-Star in 2014 and earned All-League honors for the 2013–14 season. Moodie has experience playing in multiple countries across the world outside of Canada, primarily Argentina. He played college basketball at Ball State for three years and capped his amateur career representing the University of Indianapolis. == References == == External links == * IBL profile * FIBA.com profile Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Argentina Category:American expatriate basketball people in Canada Category:American men's basketball players Category:Ball State Cardinals men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Indiana Category:Boca Juniors basketball players Category:Brampton A's players Category:Halifax Rainmen players Category:Indianapolis Greyhounds men's basketball players Category:Lanús basketball players Category:Laval Kebs players Category:Quilmes de Mar del Plata basketball players Category:Sportspeople from South Bend, Indiana Category:Shooting guards
title: Cedric Moodie
